A careless admin used the same prime when generating the RSA keys for two messages. Can you recover the flag from 433603163666347643311263252992009690035876795815265424012453584712941027952360528932521454922183440601960262892987691982676279781680772891049667325166904567710440501662450663086941951824409339787882018737347735164829492478609408908?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=489800624234230856018414500093222806534224572360660448791598688203934466530293633979040479458478802720516478918098556935158950150740125191411690299094639351352094666555754735318434006413894717639088801951512069939442729000698297721, e=251984575465071203467468033567664408441790236928154745613724671980647096005891204215811381226175552173938985407523024011034933826795189631888761165894212633155693474515456281501786061864185853208414355685554717067575410538801724447

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{tqp97c2s}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 433603163666347643311263252992009690035876795815265424012453584712941027952360528932521454922183440601960262892987691982676279781680772891049667325166904567710440501662450663086941951824409339787882018737347735164829492478609408908
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=489800624234230856018414500093222806534224572360660448791598688203934466530293633979040479458478802720516478918098556935158950150740125191411690299094639351352094666555754735318434006413894717639088801951512069939442729000698297721, e=251984575465071203467468033567664408441790236928154745613724671980647096005891204215811381226175552173938985407523024011034933826795189631888761165894212633155693474515456281501786061864185853208414355685554717067575410538801724447
extra_info: p=22131439723484571712406251446399822627397774187473034868233291240656793294462688724633896623733915748079291013379189, q=22131439723484571712406251446399822627397774187473034868233291240656793294462688724633896623733915748079291013379189, Ï†(n)=489800624234230856018414500093222806534224572360660448791598688203934466530293633979040479458478802720516478918098512672279503181596700378908797499449384555803719720486018268735952692827305792261639534158264602107946570418671539344
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
